cdn options

Jump to Table of Contents

getting started

yogi can help you get your module seen via the free Gallery Content Delivery Network. Any module that uses the YUI BSD License from a user with a signed CLA qualifies.

making a request

Making a CDN request with yogi is as simple as issuing yogi cdn request from inside of a modules source directory.

viewing your modules info

You can view the information about your module with: yogi info from inside of the modules source directory or yogi info [modulename].

checking status

You can view the status of your module with: yogi cdn status from inside of the modules source directory or yogi cdn status.

  • Get the Source
  • File an Issue
